I’m an independent programmer from Barcelona. I build public and private web applications for companies and institutions. Also, I write [code] for fun. ¶ I’ve had the privilege of working with many great collaborators, like Barcelona Academy of Art, DeHavilland Ediciones, Etnia Barcelona, La Charca Literaria, Masterbloggen, Micuento, and Prospera Stiftelsen. ¶ Recently, my focus has been on atomic design, critical making, digital humanities, re-decentralizing the Web, and how design and code can come together to create really beautiful experiences. ¶ Feel free to email me at hello@juanma.xyz (0x5a7588238476115c).
